pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 24, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s itinerary for Friday, June 24, 2016:

Québec City, Québec 

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the official reception held by the Premier of Québec to mark la Fête nationale du Québec.

Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec
Central Pavillon
179 Grande Allée Ouest
Québec City, Québec 

Notes for the media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.


11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the official unveiling of the Pierre Lassonde Pavillon at Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec and will deliver remarks.

Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec
Lassonde Pavillon
179 Grande Allée Ouest
Québec City, Québec 

Note for the media:

  • Open coverage


Sainte-Thérèse, Québec 

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend celebrations for la Fête nationale du Québec in Sainte-Thérèse.


Montréal, Québec 

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend celebrations for la Fête nationale du Québec in Villeray.


PMO – Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
